about_the_game:
On the land where flowers have bloomed, bear creative fruits once again
Five Elements Seal: Infinity, a game that allows beautiful flowers to bear fruit.

has a rich selection of chapters

At present, the game has produced six chapters, each with a different gameplay. Players can challenge themselves in different chapters
The combination of strategy and classics
Sealing element power is the core of the game, but how to seal it is a serious issue. You need to control the overall map, and in the next second, it may no longer be under your control. Everything needs to be restarted
The Birth of Custom Levels
Sorry, the gameplay of Creative Workshop is not yet fully developed. However, in the future, we will continue to develop gameplay related to Creative Workshop. In Creative Workshop, players can create their own levels and share them with their friends and opponents.

Looking forward to your feedback

During the game, players can contact us to share their ideas and ideas, and we will respond one by one. We will apply your ideas and ideas to the game's updates and leave your name on the game's development list, because it is you who make the entire game more complete.
Thank you for your feedback. Looking forward to your feedback.
detailed_description:
On the land where flowers have bloomed, bear creative fruits once again
Five Elements Seal: Infinity, a game that allows beautiful flowers to bear fruit.

has a rich selection of chapters

At present, the game has produced six chapters, each with a different gameplay. Players can challenge themselves in different chapters
The combination of strategy and classics
Sealing element power is the core of the game, but how to seal it is a serious issue. You need to control the overall map, and in the next second, it may no longer be under your control. Everything needs to be restarted
The Birth of Custom Levels
Sorry, the gameplay of Creative Workshop is not yet fully developed. However, in the future, we will continue to develop gameplay related to Creative Workshop. In Creative Workshop, players can create their own levels and share them with their friends and opponents.

Looking forward to your feedback

During the game, players can contact us to share their ideas and ideas, and we will respond one by one. We will apply your ideas and ideas to the game's updates and leave your name on the game's development list, because it is you who make the entire game more complete.
Thank you for your feedback. Looking forward to your feedback.
name: five-element Seal: Infinity

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win7/Win10/Win11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 or AMD FX 8320
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVDIA GTX 660 or AMD FX 8320
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win7/Win10/Win11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVDIA GTX 1060
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Representing the world of hell; A world that can shuttle through space, a world that can rotate continents... In the future, there will be more worlds and levels waiting to be explored, representing a world of creation where one can create their own world
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Korean
